content: Is there a city that is always cold?

Yes, there are several cities around the world that are known for their consistently cold climates. One such city is Yakutsk, located in the Sakha Republic, Russia. Yakutsk is one of the coldest cities on Earth, with average temperatures ranging from -40°C to -45°C (-40°F to -49°F) during winter months. Another example is Tromsø, Norway, which experiences Arctic winters with temperatures often dropping below -10°C (14°F).
